titlepage.titleproper: A Guide to the Edward Vitale violin music collection, ca. 1700-1900
titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
Special Collections and Archives C0155
titlepage.author: Eron Ackerman

archdesc.runner: Special Collections and Archives, George Mason University

did.head: Descriptive Summary

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: George Mason University. Special Collections and Archives.

did.unittitle: Edward Vitale violin music collection
did.abstract: This collection contains manuscripts and published arrangements of 18th and 19th century violin music.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: There are no restrictions on personal use. Permission to publish material from the Edward Vitale violin music collection must be obtained from Special Collections Research Center, George Mason University Libraries.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Edward Vitale violin music collection, C0155, Special Collections and Archives, George Mason University Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Collection donated by Christopher Thaiss in 1981.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processed by Special Collections and Archives staff. EAD markup completed by Eron Ackerman in March 2009. Additional processing and EAD markup completed by Hal Barthold in 2011.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Edward Vitale was a symphony violinist.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains manuscripts and published arrangements of 18th and 19th century violin music.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged by subject.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Special Collections and Archives holds other music collections including and the .

did.unittitle: An electronic box inventory is unavailable. Please contact speccoll@gmu.edu for more information.
